name: XON Episode Three
description:
XON is a puzzle adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven.
Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...

NOTE: If you are stuck because of a bug, go to the game menu and tap 10 times on the XON logo. You will be teleported to the starting area so you can continue playing.

If you're totally stuck, here's a walkthrough: http://imagofx.com/walkthrough/xonep3.html
